item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:
“You, son of man—this is what the Sovereign Lord says to the land of Israel: An end! The end is coming on the four corners of the land!

The <st data-num="07093" class="">end</st> is <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">upon</st> you, and I will <st data-num="07971" class="">release</st> my <st data-num="0639" class="">anger</st> against you. I will <st data-num="08199" class="">judge</st><n id="1" /> you according to your <st data-num="01870" class="">behavior</st>;<n id="2" /> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">hold</st> you <st data-num="05921">accountable for</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable practices</st>.

My eye will not pity you; I will not spare you. For I will hold you responsible for your behavior, and you will suffer the consequences of your abominable practices. Then you will know that I am the Lord!
“This is what the Sovereign Lord says: A disaster—a one-of-a-kind disaster—is coming!

An <st data-num="07093" class="">end</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">comes</st><n id="1" />—the <st data-num="07093" class="">end</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">comes</st>!<n id="2" /> It has <st data-num="06974" class="">awakened</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> you!<n id="3" /> <st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, it is <st data-num="0935" class="">coming</st>!<n id="4" />

<st data-num="06843" class="">Doom</st> <st data-num="0935">is coming</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">upon</st> you who <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>! The <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">is coming</st>, the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="07138" class="">near</st>. There are <st data-num="04103" class="">sounds of tumult</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01906" class="">shouts of joy</st>, on the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="07138" class="">Soon</st> <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> I will <st data-num="08210" class="">pour out</st> my <st data-num="02534" class="">rage</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> you; I will <st data-num="03615" class="">fully vent</st> my <st data-num="0639" class="">anger</st> against you. I will <st data-num="08199" class="">judge</st> you according to your <st data-num="01870" class="">behavior</st>. I will <st data-num="05414" class="">hold</st> you <st data-num="05921" class="">accountable for</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable practices</st>.

My eye will not pity you; I will not spare you. For your behavior I will hold you accountable, and you will suffer the consequences of your abominable practices. Then you will know that it is I, the Lord, who is striking you.
“Look, the day! Look, it is coming! Doom has gone out! The staff has budded, pride has blossomed!

<st data-num="02555" class="">Violence</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="06965" class="">grown</st> into a <st data-num="04294" class="">staff</st> that supports <st data-num="07562" class="">wickedness</st>. <st data-num="03808" class="">Not</st> one of <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st> will be left<n id="2" />—<st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> from their <st data-num="01995" class="">crowd</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> from their <st data-num="01991" class="">wealth</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> from their <st data-num="05089" class="">prominence</st>.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> has <st data-num="0935">come</st>; the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> has <st data-num="05060" class="">struck</st>! The <st data-num="07069" class="">customer</st> should <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08055" class="">rejoice</st>, <st data-num="0408" class="">nor</st> the <st data-num="04376" class="">seller</st> <st data-num="056" class="">mourn</st>; <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> divine <st data-num="02740" class="">wrath</st><n id="1" /> comes <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> their <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="01995" class="">crowd</st>.
The customer will no longer pay the seller while both parties are alive, for the vision against their whole crowd will not be revoked. Each person, for his iniquity, will fail to preserve his life.
“They have blown the trumpet and everyone is ready, but no one goes to battle, because my anger is against their whole crowd.

The <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> is <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st>; <st data-num="01698" class="">pestilence</st> and <st data-num="07458" class="">famine</st> are inside the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>. <st data-num="0834" class="">Whoever</st> is in the <st data-num="07704" class="">open field</st> will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> by the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>, and <st data-num="07458" class="">famine</st> and <st data-num="01698" class="">pestilence</st> will <st data-num="0398" class="">consume</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">everyone</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.

Their <st data-num="06412" class="">survivors</st> will <st data-num="06403" class="">escape</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> and <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> like <st data-num="03123" class="">doves</st> of the <st data-num="01516" class="">valleys</st><n id="1" />; <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them will <st data-num="01993" class="">moan</st>—<st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> one for his <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> their <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> will <st data-num="07503" class="">hang limp</st>; their <st data-num="03605 01290">knees</st> will <st data-num="01980" class="">be wet</st> with <st data-num="04325" class="">urine</st>.<n id="1" />

They will <st data-num="02296" class="">wear</st> <st data-num="08242" class="">sackcloth</st>, <st data-num="06427" class="">terror</st> will <st data-num="03680" class="">cover</st> them; <st data-num="0955" class="">shame</st> will be <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="06440" class="">faces</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st> will be shaved <st data-num="07144" class="">bald</st>.<n id="1" />

They will discard their silver in the streets, and their gold will be treated like filth. Their silver and gold will not be able to deliver them on the day of the Lord’s fury. They will not satisfy their hunger or fill their stomachs because their wealth was the obstacle leading to their iniquity.

They <st data-num="07760" class="">rendered</st> the <st data-num="06643" class="">beauty</st> of his <st data-num="05716" class="">ornaments</st> into <st data-num="01347" class="">pride</st>,<n id="1" /> and with it they <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> their <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable</st> <st data-num="06754" class="">images</st>—their <st data-num="08251" class="">detestable idols</st>. <st data-num="05921 03651">Therefore</st> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">render</st> it <st data-num="05079" class="">filthy</st> to them.

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> it <st data-num="03027" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02114" class="">foreigners</st> as <st data-num="0957" class="">loot</st>, to the <st data-num="0776" class="">world’s</st> <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked ones</st> as <st data-num="07998" class="">plunder</st>, and they will <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrate</st> it.

I will <st data-num="05437" class="">turn</st> my <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">away</st> from <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>, and they will <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrate</st> my <st data-num="06845" class="">treasured place</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06530" class="">Vandals</st> will <st data-num="0935" class="">enter</st> it and <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrate</st> it.<n id="2" />

(<st data-num="06213" class="">Make</st> the <st data-num="07569" class="">chain</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="04390" class="">is full of</st> <st data-num="04941 01818">murder</st><n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="04390" class="">is full of</st> <st data-num="02555" class="">violence</st>.)

I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> the most <st data-num="07451" class="">wicked</st> of the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>, and they will <st data-num="03423" class="">take possession</st> of their <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st>. I will <st data-num="07673" class="">put an end</st> to the <st data-num="01347" class="">arrogance</st> of the <st data-num="05794" class="">strong</st>, and their <st data-num="06942" class="">sanctuaries</st><n id="1" /> will be <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrated</st>.

<st data-num="07089" class="">Terror</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0935">is coming</st>! They will <st data-num="01245" class="">seek</st> <st data-num="07965" class="">peace</st>, but find <st data-num="0369" class="">none</st>.

<st data-num="01943" class="">Disaster</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">after</st> <st data-num="01943" class="">disaster</st> will <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st>, and one <st data-num="08052" class="">rumor</st> <st data-num="0413 01961">after</st> <st data-num="08052" class="">another</st>. They will <st data-num="01245" class="">seek</st> a <st data-num="02377" class="">vision</st> from a <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st>; <st data-num="03548" class="">priestly</st> <st data-num="08451" class="">instruction</st> will <st data-num="06" class="">disappear</st>, along with <st data-num="06098" class="">counsel</st> from the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st>.

The king will mourn and the prince will be clothed with shuddering; the hands of the people of the land will tremble. Based on their behavior I will deal with them, and by their standard of justice I will judge them. Then they will know that I am the Lord!”
